product_overview: Naveen Textiles is a premium textile e-commerce platform tailored for Indian consumers, featuring a mobile-first design, WhatsApp-integrated checkout, and comprehensive admin and user management.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and intuitive online shopping experience for textile products.
Enable easy product discovery through advanced filtering and search capabilities.
Integrate WhatsApp for order communication and checkout completion.
Support robust user authentication and profile management.
Offer an efficient admin dashboard for product, order, and user management.
Ensure responsive design optimized across devices.
Maintain high performance and security standards.
key_features: Homepage with hero carousel, featured products, and category navigation.
Product listing with filtering by main and sub categories, price, color, size, and sort options.
Detailed product pages with image galleries, variant selection, and add to cart functionality.
Shopping cart management including item quantity updates, removals, and order summary with shipping calculation.
Checkout flow capturing customer and shipping details, generating order numbers, integrating WhatsApp for order finalization.
User authentication with registration, login, session management, and profile/order history management.
Admin panel with dashboards, product CRUD, order status updates, and user management.
Static informational pages such as FAQs, contact, shipping, returns, terms, and privacy.
Responsive, mobile-first UI using Tailwind CSS with brand color theming.
Integration with Supabase for backend database and data management.
Hosting and deployment via Vercel with environment-based configuration.
user_flow_summary: User visits homepage and browses featured products or navigates via category menus.
User applies filters to product listings and selects a product to view details.
User selects size, color, and quantity variants, then adds product to the cart.
User reviews cart contents, updates quantities or removes items as needed.
User proceeds to checkout, filling in required customer and shipping information.
User places order, triggering order creation, inventory reservation, and automated WhatsApp message generation for order confirmation.
Registered users can log in or register, access their profile, manage addresses, and view order history.
Admin users log into the admin dashboard to monitor metrics, manage products, orders, and users.
validation_criteria: Product listings display correct items filtered by user-selected criteria without page reload.
Product detail pages show accurate variant availability and pricing.
Cart operations (add/update/remove) behave correctly and validate stock and quantity limits.
Checkout process collects all required data, generates unique order numbers, and sends correct WhatsApp messages.
User authentication securely manages sessions and persists user state.
Admin panel reflects real-time data for products, orders, and users, allowing CRUD operations.
Responsive UI renders correctly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
APIs respond with expected status codes and data formats as per specifications.
Security measures prevent common vulnerabilities like CSRF, XSS, and ensure safe data handling.
Performance metrics meet targets for loading times and interactivity.
